mapper.select: select f.faq_no, f.titl, f.conts, f.faq_type_no, ft.name from faq f left outer join faq_type ft on f.faq_type_no = ft.faq_type_no order by f.faq_type_no asc;
select f.faq_no, f.titl, f.conts, f.faq_type_no, ft.name from faq f left outer join faq_type ft on f.faq_type_no = ft.faq_type_no where f.faq_type_no = #{value} order by f.faq_type_no asc;
select distinct ft.faq_type_no, ft.name from faq f right outer join faq_type ft on f.faq_type_no = ft.faq_type_no order by ft.faq_type_no asc;
select f.faq_no, f.titl, f.conts, f.faq_type_no, ft.name from faq f left outer join faq_type ft on f.faq_type_no = ft.faq_type_no where f.faq_no = #{value};
mapper.insert: insert into faq(faq_type_no, titl, conts) values(#{qcNo}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.update: update faq set faq_type_no = #{qcNo}, titl = #{title}, conts = #{contents} where faq_no = #{no};
